item.description:
So in my quest to making this the year of health & wealth.... I'm looking for some creative ideas and help.  Instead of going out for pizza after volleyball we can come to my house for yummy healthy food. And if Volleyball get's cancelled we can come here instead.

I love salads but they can get boring - so I'm looking for your help.

If you bring a recipe please email it to me so I can print copies for the guests.

Please no store bought salads or dressings. Organic if possible. I know that's not in everyones budget but it would be good to share ideas and recipes.

We don't need as many salads as guests so please post your idea or favorite salad in the comment section and if you have an alternative dish - protein? healthy dessert? whatever post that as well. I will pick a few based on how many guests we have.
item.how_to_find_us: yellow house - first one on the circular drive

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: POST VOLLEYBALL Salad Night
